Discover imaginative tasting menus, seasonal ingredients, and an intimate fine dining experience that has made Circa 1886 one of Charleston‚Äôs most acclaimed restaurants. Reserve a Table EXPLORE OUR MENUS FOR DINNER, WINE, AND COCKTAILS. Discover the flavors that define Circa 1886. Menus Private Gatherings Intimate Celebrations From anniversaries and family reunions to weddings and rehearsal dinners, our staff is experienced in creating unique, personalized, and memorable events. Learn More Events & Experiences Celebrate the art of fine taste Discover the art of celebration at Circa 1886. From elegant wine and cocktail classes to extraordinary seasonal events, each experience invites you to savor the creativity, craftsmanship, and charm that define Charleston‚Äôs most refined gatherings. Learn More A Legacy of Charleston Hospitality Our Story Discover the story of Circa 1886‚Äîwhere Charleston‚Äôs rich history and timeless setting at Wentworth Mansion¬Æ meet the creativity and dedication of the culinary team who bring our vision to life. Learn More Executive Chef Marc Collins Executive Chef Marc Collins has been masterfully creating culinary magic for more than 20 years, transforming any ordinary night out into a spectacular experience. Meet The Team "Our dining experience surpassed our expectations." It is well beyond time that the Michelin folks award at least two stars to Circa 1886. In our experience, it has met or surpassed that standard on every occasion. For 15 years. Thank you Circa, for so many truly memorable meals! Gail R. "Top-notch dining experience" What an amazing dining experience this was. Set in what was once the carriage house. Beautifully decorated and a lovely restful experience. Our waiter was superb (and we connected immediately with him as he is originally from the same state and area as we live). My husband and I each had the tasting menu. He had the Cooper Menu and I had the Ashley Menu. The food was absolutely top rate! If you want a quiet, elegant meal, I highly recommend Circa 1886. C6239KKmonicad | Nashua, New Hampshire | 4/30/23 "Perfection!" Husband and I had each of the 5-course tasting menus. The service all around was top-notch. Wine pairings were perfection, and the quality and quantity of food was amazing. Best meal. I cannot speak highly enough of this hidden gem! dpp74 | St. Augustine, Florida | 12/31/22 Awards & Accolades Celebrating Excellence Top 1% Worldwide Best of the Best Date Night Restaurant Tripadvisor 2025 Pastry Chef of the Year Executive Pastry Chef Ashley Cardona Stars of the Industry 2025 Best of Award of Excellence Wine Spectator since 2004 View All circa1886 View Instagram post by circa1886 Jan 17 Open post by circa1886 with ID 18181836103361987 Step into the heart of Circa 1886, where every ingredient and every movement is guided by care.
